name: Outcast
description: Shunned by society, you survived in the wild or hidden on the fringes of cities. You carry mistrust but also resourcefulness.

feature.name: Wanderer's Memory
feature.description: You can recall routes, hidden paths, and safe places in regions you've traveled. You gain advantage on Survival checks to navigate terrain you've previously explored.

traits.text: I avoid eye contact and conversation.
I hoard food and supplies obsessively.
I speak bluntly and without social grace.
I watch others carefully before acting.
I am slow to trust but loyal once trust is earned.
I prefer the company of animals to people.
I never forget a kindness or a slight.

ideals.text: Freedom. No one should be chained by society.
Self-Reliance. I depend on no one.
Revenge. I will make those who cast me out pay.
Redemption. I will prove my worth.
Nature. The wild is pure; civilization is corrupt.

bonds.text: A wild place is my sanctuary.
Someone helped me survive; I owe them everything.
I seek to find others like me.
I protect the weak and outcast.
A keepsake reminds me of my former life.
I will reclaim what was taken from me.

flaws.text: I react violently to perceived threats.
I push away those who try to get close.
